title: SOLD: 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamps (lot of 6 w/ 2 HOF)
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamps (lot of 6 w/ 2 HOF)
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are the following six 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamps.  

Included are Archer, Marquard, Moran, Oldring, Ritchie, and Wallace.  Technical condition ranges from Poor to Good on these, although eye appeal is certainly top notch.

Please email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.  Please add $5 for shipping no matter how many you buy.  Will accept $X,XXX if you purchase the entire lot of six.

Jimmy Archer - $XXX
Rube Marquard - $XXX
Pat Moran - $XXX
Rube Oldring - $XXX
Lewis Ritchie - $XXX
Bobby Wallace - $XXX
All six - $X,XXX
